data.title: Cormac McCarthy – Audio Books, Best Sellers, Author Bio
data.meta_description: Learn more about Cormac McCarthy. Browse Cormac McCarthy’s best-selling audiobooks and newest titles. Discover more authors you’ll love listening to on Audible.
data.text:
Blood Meridian

Or the Evening Redness in the West

By: Cormac McCarthy

Narrated by: Richard Poe

Length: 13 hrs and 6 mins

Unabridged

Overall

4.5 out of 5 stars 10,501

Performance

4.5 out of 5 stars 8,876

Story

4.5 out of 5 stars 8,859

The striking novel Blood Meridian offers an unflinching narrative of the brutality that accompanied the push west on the 1850s Texas frontier....

5 out of 5 stars

A beautiful nightmare

By Ryan on 07-11-11

In a post-apocalyptic America, a father and his young son walk toward the coast. Their relationship comes to represent goodness in a world of utter devastation....
